about.errorCopy: Please try again in a moment.
about.metaDescription: Learn about momentstudio and the story behind our handcrafted art.

contact.title: Contact
contact.metaDescription: Get in touch with momentstudio for questions, custom orders, or support.
contact.errorCopy: Please try again in a moment.
contact.intro: Questions about an order, a custom piece, or a collaboration? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.replyTime: We typically reply within 1–2 business days.

form.title: Send a message
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help…
form.successCopy: Thanks for reaching out. We'll get back to you soon.
form.error: Could not send your message. Please try again.

account.loadError: Unable to load account details right now.

unsaved.confirmDiscard: You have unsaved changes. Discard them and leave?

verification.sentStatus: Verification email sent. Enter the token you received.

cooldowns.username: Username can be changed again in {{time}}.
cooldowns.displayName: Display name can be changed again in {{time}}.
cooldowns.email: Primary email can be changed again in {{time}}.

errors.dobFuture: Date of birth cannot be in the future.

aliases.loadError: Could not load your username/display name history.

security.subtitle: Manage password, emails, and connected accounts.

password.title: Password
password.copy: Change your password to keep your account secure.

twoFactor.title: Two-factor authentication
twoFactor.copy: Protect your account with an authenticator app and recovery codes.
twoFactor.setupHint: Add this account to your authenticator app, then enter a code to enable two-factor.
twoFactor.recoveryCopy: Save these codes somewhere safe. Each code can be used once.
twoFactor.regenerateConfirm: Regenerate recovery codes? Old codes will stop working.

passkeys.title: Passkeys
passkeys.copy: Use biometrics or a device PIN to sign in without a password.
passkeys.notSupported: Passkeys are not supported on this device.

emails.title: Emails
emails.copy: Manage the emails you can use to sign in.
emails.primaryHint: To change your primary email, add and verify another email, then make it primary (requires password).
emails.googleWarning: Unlink Google before switching primary email.
emails.verificationSent: Verification code sent. Enter it below to verify.
emails.makePrimaryPasswordRequired: Confirm your password to switch primary email.

google.title: Google
google.copy: Linking Google lets you sign in faster. We never post without permission.
google.passwordRequiredLink: Enter your password to link Google.
google.startLinkError: Could not start Google link flow.
google.passwordRequiredUnlink: Enter your password to unlink Google.

payment.title: Payment methods
payment.stripeKeyMissing: Stripe publishable key is not configured
payment.missingPaymentMethod: Payment method missing from setup intent.

devices.title: Devices
devices.copy: Review where you're signed in. If something looks unfamiliar, sign out of other devices.
devices.noneRevoked: No other devices to sign out.
devices.revokeError: Could not sign out other devices.

activity.title: Recent activity
activity.copy: Sign-ins and security changes for your account.

session.title: Session
session.copy: You will be logged out after inactivity to keep your account safe.
session.expired: Session expired. Please sign in again.
session.idleLogout: You have been logged out due to inactivity.

overview.title: Overview
overview.noOrdersCopy: Your recent orders will appear here.
overview.noAddressesCopy: Add a shipping address for faster checkout.

return.title: Return
return.hint: Select quantities and tell us why you want to return these items.
return.reasonPh: Tell us why you want to return these items…

errors.notEligible: This order isn't eligible for returns yet.
errors.alreadyExists: A return request already exists for this order.
errors.itemsRequired: Select at least one item to return.

cancel.title: Cancellation
cancel.hint: Tell us why you want to cancel this order. We'll review it as soon as possible.
cancel.reasonPh: Tell us why you want to cancel…

errors.notEligible: This order can't be cancelled anymore.
errors.alreadyRequested: You already requested cancellation for this order.

orders.receiptRevokeConfirm: Revoke previously shared receipt links for this order?

refund.manualRequiredCopy: This order was cancelled after payment was captured. Our team will process a refund manually.
refund.manualRequiredHint: If you have questions, contact support.

confirm.removeSelected: Remove selected items from your wishlist?

coupons.copiedCopy: Paste it in the checkout promo box.

completeProfile.title: Complete your profile
completeProfile.copy: To continue, please fill in the required details below.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.transactionalCopy: Order updates and security emails are always sent. Preferences below only affect optional community/admin and marketing emails.
notifications.replyLabel: Email me when someone replies to my blog comment.
notifications.adminLabel: Email me when new blog comments are posted (admin).
notifications.marketingLabel: Email me occasional product updates and news.
notifications.previewReply:
New reply to your comment on: Example post
From: Alex

Thanks for your message!

View: https://momentstudio.ro/blog/example
notifications.previewAdmin:
New comment on: Example post
From: Sam

Great work!

Review: https://momentstudio.ro/admin
notifications.previewMarketing: New collection: Spring ceramics\nSee what's new: https://momentstudio.ro/shop

blog.title: Blog

preview.banner: Preview mode — this post is not published yet.

blog.emptyCopy: Check back soon for new articles.
blog.metaDescription: Stories, updates, and behind-the-scenes from momentstudio.

post.errorCopy: Please try again in a moment.
post.metaDescription: Read the latest article on momentstudio.

comments.title: Comments ({{count}})
comments.empty: No comments yet. Be the first to start the discussion.
comments.reportPrompt: Optionally add a reason (spam, abuse, etc.):
comments.hidden: This comment was hidden by moderators.
comments.signInPrompt: Sign in to join the discussion

home.headline: Build the momentstudio storefront experience.
home.subhead: A crisp Angular starter with Tailwind design tokens, shared components, and a responsive shell ready for product, cart, and content flows.
home.metaDescription: Discover handcrafted ceramics with curated collections, rich product detail, and smooth checkout.

cards.strict: Angular standalone setup with strict TypeScript and routing baked in.
cards.tokens: Utility-first styling with a small token palette to keep UI consistent.
cards.primitives: Buttons, inputs, cards, modals, and toast scaffolding ready to wire.
cards.shell: Global error route, responsive header/footer, and space for store pages.

shop.title: Shop
shop.priceHint: Adjust sliders or inputs to refine results.
shop.tryAdjust: Try adjusting filters or search terms.
shop.errorTitle: We hit a snag loading products.
shop.errorCopy: Check your connection or retry in a moment.
shop.metaDescription: Browse handcrafted ceramic pieces by momentstudio. Filter by category, price, and tags.

product.notifyBackInStock: Notify me when back in stock
product.notifyRequiresSignInBody: Please sign in to request back-in-stock notifications.
product.notifyRequestedBody: We'll email you when {{name}} is available.
product.notifyCanceledBody: You won't receive back-in-stock emails for {{name}}.
product.uniqueness: Each piece is hand-thrown and glazed, so subtle variations in color and form are intentional. Expect one-of-a-kind character in every item.
product.loadErrorCopy: Check your connection and try again.
product.metaDescriptionFallback: Discover {{name}} — a handcrafted piece from momentstudio.

cart.title: Your cart
cart.emptyCopy: Browse the shop to add items.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.paymentNotReady: Payment not initialized yet. Please wait.
checkout.paymentConfirmError: Payment confirmation failed. Please try again.
checkout.name: Full name
checkout.saveAddress: Save this address for next time
checkout.deliveryLockerRequired: Please select a locker for pickup.

lockers.none: No lockers found nearby. Try moving the map or increasing the area.
lockers.error: Could not load lockers. Please try again.
lockers.noGeolocation: Geolocation is not available in this browser.
lockers.geoDenied: Could not access your location. Please allow location access and try again.

checkout.paymentPayPalHint: Pay with PayPal (you’ll be redirected). PayPal charges in EUR and the total is converted at checkout.
checkout.paypalCaptureFailed: Could not confirm PayPal payment. Please try again.
checkout.paypalCancelledCopy: No payment was made. You can return to checkout and try another method.
checkout.stripeConfirmFailed: Could not confirm Stripe payment. Please try again.
checkout.stripeCancelledCopy: No payment was made. You can return to checkout and try another method.
checkout.successCopy: We emailed you a confirmation. You can continue shopping or view your orders.
checkout.successNoSummary: Order summary is not available yet. Please check your account for details.
checkout.promoPending: Promo {{code}} will be validated at checkout.
checkout.couponMinSubtotalRemaining: Add {{amount}} RON more to reach the {{min}} RON minimum subtotal.

couponReasons.no_eligible_items: No eligible items in your cart
couponReasons.scope_no_match: No eligible products in your cart

auth.resetRequestCopy: Enter your email and we'll send a reset link.
auth.emailVerificationNeeded: Email verification needed to place orders.
auth.name: Name
auth.displayNameHintEmpty: Your public label preview will appear here (e.g. Ana#0 (ana2005l)).
auth.displayNameHintPartial: Enter both display name and username to preview your public label.
auth.phoneHint: Enter digits only (no spaces); we’ll add the country code automatically.
auth.errorLogin: Unable to login. Please try again.
auth.errorRegister: Unable to register. Please try again.
auth.errorReset: Unable to reset password. Please try again.
auth.passkeyNotSupported: Passkeys are not supported on this device.
auth.passkeyError: Could not sign in with passkey. Please try again.
auth.googleError: Google sign-in failed. Please try again.
auth.completeProfileRequiredCopy: Please provide a few required details in your account before continuing.
auth.googleLinkPasswordMissing: Password required to link Google account.
auth.languageNotSavedDetail: Could not update your preferred language. Please try again.
auth.currentPasswordRequired: Current password is required to change your username.
auth.twoFactorCopy: Enter the code from your authenticator app (or a recovery code).
auth.twoFactorMissing: Two-factor session missing. Please sign in again.

validation.usernameInvalid: Username must be 3–30 characters and may include letters, numbers, '.', '_', '-'.
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

detail.title: Submission
detail.empty: Select a message to view details.
detail.replyPlaceholder: Write a reply to the customer…
detail.solvedHint: This ticket is marked as resolved.

returns.title: Returns

detail.title: Return request
detail.empty: Select a return request to view details.

returns.viewAllForOrder: View all returns for this order

create.title: Create return request
create.hint: Select quantities and capture the reason. The customer will receive an email.
create.reasonPh: Why is the customer returning these items?
create.itemsRequired: Select at least one item to return.

library.title: Asset library
library.hint: Browse uploaded images and reuse them across pages and settings.
library.searchPlaceholder: Search by key, URL, or alt text…
library.uploadHint: Uploads are attached to {{key}} for easy organization.

checkout.title: Checkout settings
checkout.hint: Shipping uses these values. Free shipping applies when subtotal minus discounts is at or above the threshold.

builder.title: Page builder blocks
builder.hint: Optional: build richer About/Contact pages with blocks. If blocks are present, the storefront renders them instead of the Markdown body.
builder.changeUrlConfirm: Change URL from /pages/{{old}} to /pages/{{next}}? Existing links will redirect.

redirects.title: Redirects
redirects.hint: Created automatically when changing a page URL. Stale redirects point to missing content.
redirects.stale: Stale redirect: target page no longer exists.

sections.title: Homepage sections order
sections.hint: Drag to reorder sections and toggle visibility.

fields.title: Title
fields.caption: Caption (optional)
fields.galleryEmpty: No images yet. Add one to display this block.

fields.publishAtHint: Set a future time to schedule publishing.
fields.title: Title

editing.title: Editing
editing.publishAtBaseOnlyHint: If this is in the future and status is published, the post will go live at that time.
editing.summaryHint: Used for the blog list excerpt and SEO description.
editing.toolbarTip: Tip: Use the toolbar to format markdown and insert images (uploads go to the post's content images).

confirms.rollback: Rollback to version {{version}}? This will overwrite the current draft.

confirms.deleteComment: Delete this comment? This removes its body for everyone.

errors.slugRequiredCopy: Adjust the title to include letters or numbers (slug is auto-generated).
errors.loadContent: Could not load blog post content
errors.translationMetaSave: Saved translation, but could not save metadata

fx.title: FX rates
fx.hint: Used for approximate EUR/USD display; all prices and payments remain in RON.
fx.asOfHint: Leave empty to use today's date on the server.

errors.invalid: Enter positive EUR/USD per RON rates.

products.title: Products
products.hint: Search by name, slug, or SKU.

form.priceFormatHint: Use numbers and a dot with up to 2 decimals (example: 123.45).
form.shortDescriptionHint: Shown in product cards and listings (max 280 characters).

sale.title: Sale
sale.note: Changing sale pricing forces the product back to Draft until republished.
sale.startRequired: Choose a sale start date when auto-publish is enabled.
sale.valueHint: Use numbers and a dot with up to 2 decimals (example: 10.00).

bulk.note: Applying sale pricing forces products back to Draft. Use “Publish” once you're ready.

translations.title: Translations
translations.hint: Optional per-language overrides. If empty, the storefront falls back to the default fields.

categories.title: Categories
categories.slugAutoHint: Slug is auto-generated from the name.

translations.title: Translations
translations.hint: Optional per-language overrides shown on the storefront.

orders.title: Orders
orders.hint: Search by reference, id, email, or username.
orders.confirmDeleteLabel: Delete the shipping label for this order?
orders.saveHint: Updates status and tracking; emails send on status changes.

receiptLinks.title: Receipt links
receiptLinks.confirmRevoke: Revoke all shared receipt links for this order?

orders.cancelReasonHint: Required when cancelling. Shown to the customer and included in the cancellation email.
orders.refundHint: Refund is manual; this records an event and notifies the owner inbox.
orders.confirmRefund: Request a refund for this order?

errors.cancelReasonRequired: Cancel reason is required to cancel an order.

users.title: Users
users.hint: Search by email, username, or display name.
users.selectHint: Select a user to manage role, sessions, and aliases.
users.ownerLocked: Owner role can only be transferred.

confirms.rollback: Rollback to version {{version}}? This will overwrite the current content.

errors.conflictCopy: This content changed elsewhere. Reload and try again.

errors.invalidateStripe: Failed to reset Stripe coupon cache

couponsV2.title: Coupons
couponsV2.subtitle: Manage promotions, coupons, and coupon assignments.

promotions.title: Promotions
promotions.hint: Configure discount rules and their scope.

coupons.title: Coupons
coupons.hint: Create and manage coupon codes for a promotion.
coupons.selectPromotion: Select a promotion to view its coupons.

assignments.title: Assignments
assignments.hint: Assign coupons to users by email and revoke when needed.

bulk.title: Bulk actions
bulk.hint: Upload a CSV of customer emails (first column) to assign or revoke this coupon in bulk.

segment.title: Segment targeting
segment.hint: Target users by preferences (marketing opt-in, email verified). Runs in the background for large lists.

errors.invalidDateRange: Ends at must be after starts at
errors.percentRequired: Percentage off must be between 0 and 100
errors.amountRequired: Amount off must be greater than 0

ownerTransfer.title: Transfer ownership
ownerTransfer.description: Transfer the owner role to another user. This action is owner-only and requires password confirmation.

wishlist.signInBody: Please sign in to save items to your wishlist.

tickets.title: Help center
tickets.subtitle: Track your support requests and replies.
tickets.orderHint: Selecting an order helps us locate the purchase faster.
tickets.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the issue and what you need help with…
tickets.threadEmpty: Select a ticket to see the conversation.
tickets.solvedHint: This ticket is marked as solved.
